jasperReport.name: Formato8_1_2
jasperReport.queryString:
SELECT i.fact_id as correlativo, (select name from ad_client where ad_client_id = i.ad_client_id) AS name, (select name from c_period where c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID}) as periodo, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN (SELECT taxid FROM ad_clientinfo where ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID}) ELSE (SELECT taxid FROM ad_orginfo WHERE ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} and ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID}) END) AS ruc, (SELECT CASE WHEN $P{AD_Org_ID}=0 THEN (SELECT description FROM ad_client where ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID}) ELSE (SELECT o.description FROM ad_client c JOIN ad_org o on c.ad_client_id = o.ad_client_id WHERE c.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} and o.ad_org_id = $P{AD_Org_ID}) END) AS cliente, (select name from c_acctschema where c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID}) as esquema, -- detalle del reporte i.dateinvoiced as fecha, paymenttermduedate(i.c_paymentterm_id, i.dateinvoiced) as fechavencimiento, -- comprobante de pago (select codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = i.c_doctype_id) as tipo, i.serial as serie, i.documentno as numero, (select printname from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = i.c_doctype_id) as nombre_tipo, -- informacion del cliente getreferencevalue('C_BP_DocTypeI',bp.c_bp_doctypei) as tipo_doci, (select taxid from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = i.c_bpartner_id) as numero_doci, (select name from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = i.c_bpartner_id) as nombre_socio, -- detalle de montos dt.docbasetype, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text) AS base, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'IGV'::text) AS igv, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IG2'::text, 'BASE'::text) AS base_gravnograv, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IG2'::text, 'IGV'::text) AS igv_gravnograv, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IG3'::text, 'BASE'::text) AS base_nograv, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'IG3'::text, 'IGV'::text) AS igv_nograv, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) AS no_gravada, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'ISC'::text, 'IGV'::text) AS isc, gettaxvalue( i.c_doctype_id, i.c_invoice_id, 'OTR'::text, 'IGV'::text) AS otr_tributo, CASE WHEN charat(dt.docbasetype::character varying, 3)::text = 'C'::text THEN CurrencyConvert(i.grandtotal,i.C_Currency_ID, 308, i.dateinvoiced, i.c_conversiontype_id,i.AD_Client_ID, i.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric ELSE CurrencyConvert(i.grandtotal,i.C_Currency_ID, 308, i.dateinvoiced, i.c_conversiontype_id,i.AD_Client_ID, i.AD_Org_ID) END AS total, currencyrate(i.c_currency_id, 308, i.dateinvoiced, i.c_conversiontype_id, i.ad_client_id, 0) as tipo_cambio , --detraccion ''::text AS numero_detra, null::timestamp AS fecha_detra, --(SELECT py.checkno FROM c_payment py --JOIN c_bankaccount bka ON bka.c_bankaccount_id = py.c_bankaccount_id --WHERE bka.bankaccounttype = 'D' limit 1) as numero_detra, --(SELECT py.datetrx FROM c_payment py --JOIN c_bankaccount bka ON bka.c_bankaccount_id = py.c_bankaccount_id --WHERE bka.bankaccounttype = 'D' limit 1) as fecha_detra, --referencia
(SELECT dateinvoiced from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = i.ref_invoice_id) as fecharef, (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = i.ref_invoice_id)) as tiporef, (SELECT serial from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = i.ref_invoice_id) as serieref, (SELECT documentno from c_invoice where c_invoice_id = i.ref_invoice_id) as documentref from c_invoice i join c_bpartner bp on i.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id join c_doctype dt on i.c_doctype_id = dt.c_doctype_id join gl_category gl ON gl.gl_category_id = dt.gl_category_id WHERE i.issotrx = 'N' AND gl.codsunat = '08' AND i.docstatus in ('CO','CL') AND ( CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{C_Period_ID},0) = 0 THEN date(i.dateacct)>=date($P{DateFrom1}) AND date(i.dateacct)<=date($P{DateFrom2}) ELSE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FACT_ACCT f WHERE f.ad_table_id = 318 AND f.c_acctschema_id = $P{C_AcctSchema_ID} AND f.c_period_id = $P{C_Period_ID} AND f.ad_client_id = $P{AD_Client_ID} AND f.record_id = i.c_invoice_ID) END) AND ( CASE WHEN COALESCE($P{AD_Org_ID}, 0) = 0 THEN true ELSE i.AD_Org_ID = $P{AD_Org_ID} END) ORDER BY dt.codsunat, i.fact_id

staticText.text: Adq. Grav. Dest. a Op. Gravadas
